name: LOVE DICE
description:
What do rolling the dice and love have in common, you might ask?

You need a bit of good luck in order to succeed in both.

Help Peach find his piece of luck in order to meet his true love by midnight. 

All you need is luck!

How to Play:

Click the dice box to roll your dice, you can roll one of three actions- detect, walk and hit. Avoid red-lit monsters and find your beautiful date by the end of the clock timed turns! When finished playing your turn click end turn and watch the club go wild!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam, 2022

Developers: Alon Levy, Elior Digmi

Design and Animation: Michal Shatz, Liza Shelkovich, Noga Doron

Sound Design: Yoav Lichtenberg
